properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT signing and validation.

properties.name: app.jwtRefreshExpirationMs
properties.description: Duration of validity for the refresh token in milliseconds (e.g., 7 days).

properties.name: app.jwtExpirationMs
properties.description: Duration of validity for the access token in milliseconds (e.g., 1 day).
